Name: 涅槃之路
About the game: You are in a strange world, and if you want to leave, you have to go ahead and fight until you become strong enough to reach the last level to open the door. Keep fighting, winning, strengthening yourself with rewards, hitting all kinds of opponents, the most important thing is to keep trying. Only a strong enough man can win the final victory. Battle-related There are three attributes in the game: power, skill and capital. Fifteen skills. Sword, shield and book are each equipped with 30 pieces. After each battle, you can choose one of the three rewards: equipment, attribute points and skill points to get, choose, use, match equipment, attribute and skill to make yourself strong enough to defeat a stronger opponent. Battle itself does not require operation, you just choose to match the equipment, learn skills and add relevant attributes to prepare for war.
